article_node.title: Firefly Aerospace: The Space Stock You Should Not Buy (NASDAQ:FLY)
article_node.summary: The article advertises The Aerospace Forum, a subscription‑based aerospace, defense and airline research service on Seeking Alpha that offers reports, data and an in‑house analytics platform called evoX. It notes the growing interest in commercial lunar exploration, mentioning that only a few companies—including Firefly Aerospace—have successfully landed on the Moon. The piece also includes standard disclosures that the author holds no positions in the companies discussed and receives no compensation beyond Seeking Alpha. The overall focus is on promoting the research service and its data‑driven investment insights.
